description:
Simple cross platform two-factor authentication app.

Authme is a two-factor authentication app, you can import from QR codes or Google Authenticator QR codes.
Authme 6.0.0
- 2024.12.10. (Release update)
Breaking
- Update encryption key storage #325
Feature
- Background transparency #238
- Review size of text and visual elements to better fit screen resolution #314
- Update to Tauri V2 #292
Improvement
- Improved codes page #319
- Add Language section in the translation #327
Removed
- Removed global shortcuts #326
- Removed blur codes #331
- Removed codes layout #333
